text: Çuz in nest, ki misoli zindagii dunjo hamcun oʙest, ki az osmon furū rextem, pas, gijohoni [gunoguni] zamin az onci mardum va corpojon mexūrand, ʙo on daromext [va rūjid] to on goh ki zamin pirojai xudro [ʙo gulho va gijohon] ʙargirift va orosta şud va sokinonaş pindoştand, ki onon ʙar on tavonoie dorand [ki az mahsulotaş ʙahramand gardand, vale nogahon] şaʙe jo rūze farmoni [vajronii] Mo omad va on [kiştu meva]-ro cunon darav kardem, ki gūī dirūz heç naʙudaast. Mo nişonaho[-i xud]-ro ʙaroi mardume, ki meandeşand, incunin ʙa ravşanī ʙajon mekunem
